Title: Dr. Bogdan Krilov (No. 29)
Writer: Jon Bokenkamp (created by), Lukas Reiter (teleplay by), John Eisendrath (teleplay by), Jon Bokenkamp (teleplay by), Brian Studler (story by), Marisa Tam (story by)
Actors: James Spader, Megan Boone, Diego Klattenhoff, Amir Arison
Plot: Red sets the Task Force to trace a Blacklister with tools to manipulate memories, causing Liz to questions her own experience. When Gale intensifies his investigation, Ressler gets a new lead on a case.
